title: SpaceX Starship launches successfully, notches new milestones on way around Earth

title: Terran Orbital announces plans to produce small satellites for geostationary orbit
summary: The company says the geosynchronous market is moving more towards small satellites

title: Surprise Chinese lunar mission hit by launch anomaly
summary: A pair of Chinese spacecraft, apparently intended for lunar orbit, have potentially been lost following an issue with a Long March rocket's upper stage on Wednesday.

title: ESA Announces Reusable Upper Stage Demonstrator Project
summary:
The European Space Agency has published a call to begin work on a demonstrator of a reusable launch vehicle upper stage.

Published on 13 March,...

title: Fox Again Urges NASA Science Community to Stick Together
summary: Nicky Fox, the head of NASA’s Science Mission Directorate, again urged the NASA science community to stick together in these tough budget times and not split into factions fighting each […]
